com.gtosoft.libvoyager.gui
Class NotificationHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.gtosoft.libvoyager.gui.NotificationHelper

public class NotificationHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class will help abstract the gory details of displaying a notification in the notification bar in Android so the calling class can focus on other things.

Author:
Brad Hein / GTOSoft.
